mapper.select: SELECT user.id as user_id, user.user_no, user.user_fullname, user.user_nickname, user.user_passwd as user_password, user.org_no, org.org_name, user.dept_no, user_mobile FROM iesms_sys.sys_user user,iesms_sys.sys_org org where user.org_no = org.org_no and user_no = #{value}

SELECT user_id, user_no,user_name,user_password,user_org_no,user_org_name,user_dept_no,user_dept_name, user_mobile, fac.factory as fac, fac.defProtocolType as txgylx,fac.defProtocolVersion as txgybb, fac.defModelNo as sbxh,fac.selModelNoList as sbxhlist FROM cisp_sys.bp_user user left join ebike.test_factory_config fac on user.user_org_no = fac.subburo where user_no = #{value}
